name: i5 PHP Bridge
short_description: Tying together Zend Framework, PHP/Java Bridge, JTOpen, and Tomcat to provide a FOSS solution for i5 (IBM i, iSeries, AS/400) PHP developers struggling with the performance issues of the Integrated File System.
